step_feedback.feedback: Great job initiating the movement by squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Keep focusing on a smooth, circular motion.
Excellent control in this part of the roll. Ensure you're completing the full circle, bringing your shoulders down and forward smoothly.
You're completing the repetitions well. Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit for breathing and lymphatic flow.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Keep up the smooth, circular movements, squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Remember to breathe deeply as you roll your shoulders back to help with lymphatic flow.
